Package org

Interface HelperClass

All Known Subinterfaces:
ScenarioServiceHandlesStoredParametersOption, ScenarioServiceIgnoreAlgorithm, SubstanceInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
AlgorithmServices, ApplyAlternativeIdentifiersTo, AttributeHelper, BackgroundTaskHelper, BendsLaunchGUI, BroadCastService, BuildInfo, ChangeLabelsAlgorithm, ClipboardService, ClusterOverviewNetworkLaunchGui, ColorHelper, Colors, ComputeAttributesAlgorithm, ContextMenuHelper, CreateHierarchyTree, DatabaseFileStatusService, DBEgravistoHelper, EdgeComponentHelper, EdgeHelper, EnzymeService, ErrorMsg, Experiment2GraphHelper, FileHelper, GeneralUtils, GraphElementHelper, GraphHelper, GraphHelperBio, GraphicExport, GraphicHelper, GravistoMainHelper, GravistoService, HierarchyAlgorithms, HomeFolder, KeggAPIServiceHelper, KeggGmlHelper, KeggHelper, KeggService, KeggSoapAndPathwayService, LaunchGui, LinkSelection, MyClusterGraphBasedReLayoutService, MyInputHelper, NewsHelper, NodeHelper, ObjectAttributeService, ObjectRef, OpenExcelFileDialogService, OpenFileDialogService, OpenMageFileDialogService, PatternGraffitiHelper, PluginHelper, PluginInfoHelper, PrettyObject, ProcessHierarchynodesDepOnLeafNodes, ProgressStatusService, ReactionService, ReleaseInfo, RSSFeedManager, ScenarioService, SearchAndSelecAlgorithm, SearchAttributeHelper, SelectAlgorithm, SetClusterLaunchGui, SettingsHelperDefaultIsFalse, SettingsHelperDefaultIsTrue, SOManalysis, SOMguiHelper, StringManipulationTools, StringScanner, Substance, SystemAnalysis, SystemInfo, ThreadSafeOptions, ToolTipHelper, TranspathService, TypedAttributeService, WorkflowHelper, XMLHelper, XPathHelper
public interface HelperClass
Directive interface for all API Helper classes.

Implement, if your class provides assisting functionality.

Most recent revision:
2.6.5
